title: Privacy Policy
content:
This website is a **personal portfolio** hosted on [Vercel](https://vercel.com).

## Data Collected
No personal data is collected or stored at present.
No cookies, analytics tools or contact forms are active.

## Hosting
Hosting is provided by *Vercel Inc.* (United States).
Server logs (anonymous) may contain your IP address for security and maintenance.

## Your Rights
Under the **General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)**,
you may exercise your rights of access, rectification and deletion once data collection is implemented.
note: This document will be updated whenever a form or tracking tool is added.
